arts.ttl: Northern Ireland boss Michael O’Neill disappointed after ‘sore loss’ to Germany
arts.sum: A young Northern Ireland once again played with plenty of intent.

arts.ttl: Woltemade scores as Germany beat Northern Ireland
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Newcastle United striker Nick Woltemade scores the only goal as Germany beat Northern Ireland in World Cup qualifying.

arts.ttl: O'Neill fumes as Woltemade goal gives 'over dramatic' Germany win in NI
arts.sum: Nick Woltemade's first international goal condemned Northern Ireland to a 1-0 World Cup qualifying defeat to Germany at Windsor Park.

arts.ttl: RATINGS | Northern Ireland 0-1 Germany: Visitors take crucial step towards World Cup qualification
arts.sum: Germany travelled to Belfast to face Northern Ireland in what could turn out to be a crucial game in both countries’ efforts to make it to next summer’s World Cup.…

arts.ttl: Germany player ratings vs Northern Ireland
arts.sum: Full Germany player ratings from Monday's World Cup qualifier against Northern Ireland.

arts.ttl: Woltemade's maiden goal wins it for Germany in Belfast
arts.sum: Despite their underwhelming performance, Germany retained their top spot in the World Cup qualifiers with a 1-0 win in Belfast.

arts.ttl: Watch: Under way in Belfast as Northern Ireland face Germany
arts.sum: Follow TV, radio and text commentary as Northern Ireland face Germany in their 2026 World Cup qualifier at Windsor Park in Belfast.

arts.ttl: Germany team v Northern Ireland now confirmed
arts.sum: The Germany team v Northern Ireland has now been named. Nick Woltemade leading the line for Germany. The game in Belfast a 7.45pm kick-off. Germany team v Northern Ireland: Baumann,... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Northern Ireland vs. Germany
arts.sum: Julian Nagelsmann confirmed his starting XI for the World Cup qualifying game in Belfast.

arts.ttl: Germany boss Julian Nagelsmann to apologise to Northern Ireland: 'I will say sorry'
arts.sum: Germany take on Northern Ireland on Monday night with Julian Nagelsmann having to u-turn on comments he made about his opponents which were labelled "a bit disrespectful"
